title: The First Trimester
description: Dr. Early is a fertility specialist renowned for two things: his unconventional methods, and his sterling success rate. Enjoy the first three Dr. Early stories, in one volume.Gemini - For a long time, Theresa has been uncomfortable with her own body, and trying to get pregnant has only increased her distaste. The Doctor's prescription is simple: she must learn to see her body as others see it, even if that means letting a lot of others see it in the process.Cancer - Wendy's body has let her down. Once a talented athlete, she just can't seem to compete at the baby-making game. The Doctor's prescription is simple: exercise, and everybody knows the best exercise is sex.Leo - Charley has spent her entire life being a pleaser, doing everything in her power to make things easier for others at the expense of her own needs. The Doctor's prescription is simple: she must learn to take what she wants, or even who she wants.
author: Constance Daley
